overview: During the reign of Emperor Taizong of Tang, the Celestial Empire flourished. Jin Wenshan, the national teacher of Fuyu, has been coveting the prosperity of the Tang Dynasty for a long time, so he deliberately set up a difficult situation that would endanger the national fortune of the Tang Dynasty. Chang'an City seems to be peaceful, but many bizarre and weird incidents have occurred one after another.
title: Poison Worm
